basic.title: Write File
basic.explanation: Use the 'with' statement to ensure files are properly closed. Mode 'w' overwrites, 'a' appends.

sync.title: Write File (Sync)
sync.explanation: Node.js fs module provides synchronous file writing with writeFileSync.
